textTemplates.name: h_4aaf7d26018a615e4866e9458b80a20a_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY - Screen flow - Loop Promer" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY - Screen flow - Loop Promer" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_Screen_flow_Loop_Promer
Type: Flow
Version: 7
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY - Screen flow - Loop Promer
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0

(APEX): h_5c3ef1c6b6623970c82df3da26d9bd41_PostPreLog
